//============================================================================
// Name        : codechef_kgp_icpc.cpp
// Author      : debasish


#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for(int k=1;k<=t;k++)
	{
	   int a,b;
	   cin >>a>>b;
	   string s1,s2;
	   cin>>s1>>s2;
	   //ut<<s2<<endl;
	   int arr[a+1][b+1];

	   for(int i=0;i<=a;i++)
	   {
		   arr[i][0]=0;
	   }

	   for(int i=0;i<=b;i++)
	   {
	   	   arr[0][i]=0;
	   }

	   for(int i=1;i<=a;i++)
	   {
		   for(int j=1;j<=b;j++)
		   {
			   if(s1[i-1] == s2[j-1])
               {
                   arr[i][j]=arr[i-1][j-1] +1;
               }
			   else
			   {
				    arr[i][j] = max (arr[i-1][j],arr[i][j-1]);
			   }
			   //cout<<arr[i][j]<<" ";
		   }
		   //cout<<endl;
	   }
	   cout<<"Case "<<k<<": "<<a+b-arr[a][b]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
